headline: Evercore ISI Raises its Price Target on Fox Corporation (FOX) to $70 and Maintains an In Line Rating
summary: Fox Corporation (NASDAQ:FOX) is among the 11 Best Entertainment Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street. On February 5, 2026, Evercore ISI raised its price target on Fox Corporation (NASDAQ:FOX) to $70 from $66 previously and maintained an In Line rating following what it described as a “strong” quarterly report and “bullish” forward commentary. That […]
